title: Training for Province Competition (LKS)
descriptions: Intensive 1-month training under senior mentors in Jakarta covering JavaScript frameworks, Laravel, WordPress, vanilla JS games, UI/UX design, and Photoshop
Prepared to compete in LKS Province Competition

title: Training for National Competition (LKS)
descriptions: 1-month intensive training using previous competition modules and exploring new techniques
Focused on improving coding, UI/UX, and project execution for national level

title: Training for Province Selection - 13th ASEAN Skills Competition
descriptions: Several weeks of preparation focusing on full-stack development and project readiness
Placed 1st provincially to advance to national selection

title: Training for National Selection - 13th ASEAN Skills Competition
descriptions: 1-month intensive preparation before national selection using previous modules and new challenges
Top 3 qualified to continue to ASC competition

title: Training Center Selection - 13th ASEAN Skills Competition (Cancelled due to COVID)
descriptions: Almost a year of training at BINUS College
Focused on full-stack development, CMS, games, and UI/UX design
Competition cancelled due to COVID; requirement was to be in top 2 out of 3 participants
